title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 152.3 - Last day on Saturday, Sunday or legal holiday
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 152.3 - Last day on Saturday, Sunday or legal holiday

State Regulations

Tax Law, ยง 691(c)

When the last day prescribed in this Subchapter
(including the last day covered by an extension of time) for filing a New York

State income tax return falls on a Saturday, Sunday, or a day which is a legal
holiday in New York State, see section
2399.3
of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
152.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
